name: Cold Open: Wrongness in Plain Sight
narrative_function: Start with a subtle anomaly that forces attention without exposition.
setup_pattern: Ordinary space + tactile texture baseline (linoleum, paint, dust) + one detail violates expectation.
payoff_pattern: That detail returns later as a rule or threat.

name: Social Erasure Hook
narrative_function: Establish isolation as the primary danger (system ignores the protagonist).
setup_pattern: Crowd flows naturally; protagonist remains still; fluorescent institutional textures stay flat and real.
payoff_pattern: Invisibility becomes weaponized or revealed as systemic control.
common_failure_modes: Protagonist is lit like a hero

name: Mystery Object Foreshadow
narrative_function: Plant a prop that implies the premise and future evidence.
setup_pattern: Still-life close-up of device; minimal industrial design; single indicator light; no exposition.
payoff_pattern: Device later extracts/reveals memory or proves betrayal.

name: Rule Hint: Too-Perfect World
narrative_function: Signal algorithmic control through repeated geometry and clean surfaces.
setup_pattern: Environment is curated; patterns repeat (hex, grid); cleanliness feels unnatural.
payoff_pattern: Character discovers the rule-set behind the world.
common_failure_modes: Looks like fantasy set, not real

name: Countdown Trigger
narrative_function: Introduce a hard clock that compresses decision space.
setup_pattern: Abstract countdown insert on glass; finger hovers; silence amplifies pressure.

name: Private World Anchor
narrative_function: Ground the character with tactile personal objects before escalation.
setup_pattern: Quiet room; practical light; personal items (bag, bedding, notes) imply instability.
payoff_pattern: Those objects become evidence or loss later.

name: Clue Contradiction
narrative_function: Build suspense by letting audience spot inconsistency first.
setup_pattern: Information artifact contains an impossible repeat/mismatch (labels, pins, loop).
payoff_pattern: Mismatch reveals loop, simulation, or cover-up.

name: Threshold Threat
narrative_function: Use doors/hatches as decision points that escalate danger.
setup_pattern: Light leaks through barrier; metal/paint textures are sharp; threat stays offscreen.
payoff_pattern: Crossing the threshold triggers next act.

name: Surveillance Format Shift
narrative_function: Change POV to imply monitoring and loss of control.
setup_pattern: Cut to CCTV-like frame; mild compression; minimal overlay bars.
payoff_pattern: Recording becomes evidence used against them.

name: Tone Mismatch in Group Scene
setup_pattern: Someone behaves 'off'; others react subtly; fluorescent realism keeps it grounded.
payoff_pattern: Offness reveals manipulation or hidden rules.

name: Impossible Space Escalation
narrative_function: Raise stakes by breaking spatial rules while staying minimal.
setup_pattern: Repetition and vanishing point imply infinity; textures remain plain and institutional.

name: Mirror / Identity Slip
narrative_function: Make perception unreliable using minimal visual mismatch.
setup_pattern: Reflection is slightly wrong; steam/water spots keep it physical, not digital.
payoff_pattern: Identity twist or memory tampering is confirmed.

name: Moral Compromise Insert
narrative_function: Show the cost: a small irreversible act in close-up.
setup_pattern: Sterile surface + stain; attempt to erase evidence.

name: Wide Isolation Peak
narrative_function: Hit peak with scale: character alone against an indifferent world.
setup_pattern: Wide empty space; muted sky; subject small; delay the impact.
payoff_pattern: Impact arrives as reveal, not action.

name: Release That Feels Wrong
narrative_function: Offer relief, then poison it with a cut or look.
payoff_pattern: Relief reinterprets as symptom or trap.

name: Button Ending: Quiet Aftermath
narrative_function: End on a controlled minimal image that reframes the story.
setup_pattern: Somatic close-up or single-word title sting; let silence do the work.
payoff_pattern: Reframe lands; viewer carries it out.

name: Anti-Drift Guardrail
narrative_function: Maintain one aesthetic envelope by explicitly blocking incompatible looks.
setup_pattern: Define forbidden looks as negative blocks before prompt writing.
payoff_pattern: Stable continuity across shots and runs.

name: Anti-Drift: Stylization Block
setup_pattern: Exclude anime/vlog/captions; enforce 'no on-screen text' unless abstract.
payoff_pattern: Cinematic realism and pacing remain intact.
